mapper.sql: id as id , appId as appId , secret as secret , type as type , adminUser as adminUser , token as token , aesKey as aesKey , uniqueKey as uniqueKey , note as note , agencyId as agencyId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO power_platform_info ( appId, secret, type, adminUser, token, aesKey, uniqueKey, note, agencyId ) VALUES ( #{appId}, #{secret}, #{type}, #{adminUser}, #{token}, #{aesKey}, #{uniqueKey}, #{note}, #{agencyId} )

INSERT INTO power_platform_info ( appId, secret, type, adminUser, token, aesKey, uniqueKey, note, agencyId ) VALUES ( #{map.appId}, #{map.secret}, #{map.type}, #{map.adminUser}, #{map.token}, #{map.aesKey}, #{map.uniqueKey}, #{map.note}, #{map.agencyId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE power_platform_info
appId = #{appId},
secret = #{secret},
type = #{type},
adminUser = #{adminUser},
token = #{token},
aesKey = #{aesKey},
uniqueKey = #{uniqueKey},
note = #{note},
agencyId = #{agencyId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE power_platform_info
appId = #{map.appId},
secret = #{map.secret},
type = #{map.type},
adminUser = #{map.adminUser},
token = #{map.token},
aesKey = #{map.aesKey},
uniqueKey = #{map.uniqueKey},
note = #{map.note},
agencyId = #{map.agencyId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE power_platform_info
appId = #{update.appId},
secret = #{update.secret},
type = #{update.type},
adminUser = #{update.adminUser},
token = #{update.token},
aesKey = #{update.aesKey},
uniqueKey = #{update.uniqueKey},
note = #{update.note},
agencyId = #{update.agencyId},
${nativeSql}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, appId
, secret
, type
, adminUser

, aesKey
, uniqueKey
, note
, agencyId
FROM power_platform_info
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
${sort.field} ${sort.order}
LIMIT 0,1

, id

, note

FROM power_platform_info
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
